lead_paragraph: KENNEDY--Michael J. It is with great sorrow we acknowledge the loss of our beloved friend and neighbor, Michael Kennedy. Mr. Kennedy served on our Board for many years and graced us with his wisdom and integrity. A great man who touched so many with his warmth and vibrance. He will be greatly missed. Our heartfelt condolences to his loving wife, Eleanora, his children Anna, Scott and Lisa and his cherished grandchildren. Board of Directors, Management & Staff, Hampshire House 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  KENNEDY, MICHAEL J
